newsitem.title: USA: Oryx closes deal on 4 U.K. North Sea fields.
newsitem.headline: Oryx closes deal on 4 U.K. North Sea fields.

text.p: Oryx Energy Co said on Wednesday that it completed the purchase of Chevron Corp's interests in four U.K. North Sea fields for $91 million.
The deal encompasses 65 percent of Chevron's interests in the Ninian, Hutton, Lyell and Murchison fields, Oryx said. Ranger Oil Ltd purchased the remaining 35 percent, Oryx said.
The deal also includes Chevron's interests in the Columba B field and some exploration acreage, Oryx said.
Oryx operates the Hutton, Lyell and Murchison fields and expects to take over as operator of Ninian early next year, once it obtains necessary government and partner approvals, Oryx said.
